actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Mathias. With written report No. 97-650.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 938.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the prayers by the Reverend Edward L. R. Elson, S.T.D., as Chaplain of the Senate during the 96th and 97th Congresses.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of the prayers by the Reverend Edward L.R. Elson, S.T.D., the Chaplain of the Senate, rendered during the 96th and 97th Congresses. Authorizes additional printing and binding of such document for the use of the Joint Committee on Printing.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the prayers by the Reverend Edward L. R. Elson, S.T.D., as Chaplain of the Senate during the 96th and 97th Congresses.
